name: Slice Knight (PixelrainStudios)
description:
SLICE KNIGHT

ONE OF THE MOST EXCITING AND CHALLENGING GAMES TO EVER HIT TRENDING ON THE PLAY STORE, HAVE YOU TRIED IT YET?

TIME your sword swings to hit the enemies! 
DODGE the bombs and use them to your advantage!

How long will you survive in the epic dungeon?

KEY FEATURES:

💣 Defeat enemies!
💣 Explosives!
💣 Swords!
💣 Dodging!
💣 Intuitive joystick controls!
💣 Be the best!

Take the challenge, be the best slice knight there ever was!

UPDATES ARE COMING! NEW CHARACTERS, NEW WEAPONS, UPGRADES AND MUCH MORE! STAY TUNED!
